main_menu_greeting:
Hi, {user_name}! 👋
What would you like to do?
error_occurred_try_again: An error occurred, please try again.
no_subscription_options_available: No subscription options available at the moment.
payment_service_unavailable: Payment service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
error_creating_payment_record: Error creating payment record. Please try again later.
error_payment_gateway_link_failed: Failed to get payment link. Please contact support.
payment_link_message: To pay for {months} mo. subscription, click the button below:
error_payment_gateway: Payment gateway error. Please try again later or contact support.
payment_successful_error_details: ✅ Payment succeeded, but an error occurred displaying details. Your subscription is active. Contact support if anything is wrong.
payment_successful_full: ✅ Payment successful! Your {months}-month subscription is active until {end_date}. Connection key: {config_link} To connect, open the link and follow the instructions 👇
payment_successful_with_promo_full: ✅ Payment successful! Your {months}-month subscription (with promo bonus +{bonus_days} days) is active until {end_date}. Connection key: {config_link} To connect, open the link and follow the instructions 👇
payment_successful_with_referral_bonus_f: ✅ Payment successful! Your {months}-month subscription (base end date: {base_end_date}) has been extended by {bonus_days} bonus days for referral from {inviter_name} and is now active until {final_end_date}. Connection key: {config_link} To connect, open the link and follow the instructions 👇
payment_failed: ❌ Payment failed or was cancelled. Please try again or contact support.
error_processing_your_payment: An error occurred processing your payment after success. Please contact support with the details.
my_subscription_details: 🔐 My Subscription: Status: {status} Active until: {end_date} (days left: {days_left}) Traffic: {traffic_used} of {traffic_limit} Configuration link: {config_link}
subscription_not_active:
You have no active subscription.
Would you like to purchase one?
error_service_unavailable: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
promo_code_not_found: Promo code {code} not found, expired, or already used the maximum number of times.
promo_code_already_used_by_user: You have already used promo code {code}.
promo_code_no_active_subscription: You must have an active subscription to apply this promo code.
promo_code_applied_success_full: ✅ Promo code applied successfully! Subscription active until {end_date}. Connection key: {config_link} To connect, open the link and follow the instructions 👇
error_applying_promo_bonus: Failed to apply promo bonus. Please try again later or contact support.
trial_already_had_subscription_or_trial: You have already used a free trial or had a paid subscription. Free trial is available only once for new users.
trial_confirm_prompt: Would you like to activate a free trial for {days} days with {traffic_gb} GB traffic limit?
trial_activated_details_message: 🚀 Your {days}-day free trial is activated! Valid until: {end_date} Traffic: {traffic_gb} GB Your configuration link: {config_link}
trial_activation_failed: Failed to activate free trial. Please try again later.
trial_activation_failed_panel_link: Failed to link your account to the server for trial activation. Please try again later.
trial_activation_failed_db: Database error during trial activation. Please try again later.
trial_activation_failed_panel_update: Failed to update trial details on the server. Please try again later.
user_not_found_for_trial: Your account was not found in the system. Please run /start first.
referral_program_info_new: Invite friends and earn bonuses! Your referral link: {referral_link} Bonuses:{bonus_details}
referral_bonus_per_period: 🎁 For a friend's {months}-month subscription: ➢ You: {inviter_bonus_days} days ➢ Friend: {referee_bonus_days} days
referral_link_for_copying_reminder: The link is above. Press and hold to copy.
referral_bonus_inviter_notification_exte: 🎉 Congrats! Your friend {referee_name} paid for a subscription. You received {days} bonus days! Your subscription is now active until {new_end_date}.
referral_bonus_inviter_notification_new_: 🎉 Congrats! Your friend {referee_name} paid for a subscription. You received a {days}-day bonus subscription! It is active until {new_end_date}.
user_is_banned: 🚫 Your account is banned. Please contact support.
admin_broadcast_cancelled_nav_back: Broadcast cancelled. You are returned to the admin panel.
admin_promo_create_prompt: Enter promo details in the format: CODE BONUS_DAYS MAX_USES [VALIDITY_DAYS] Example: {example_format} (Validity is optional; default is indefinite)
admin_promo_invalid_format: Invalid format. Please use: CODE BONUS_DAYS MAX_USES [VALIDITY_DAYS]
admin_promo_invalid_bonus_or_activations: Bonus days and max uses must be positive numbers.
admin_promo_invalid_validity_days: Validity period (in days) must be a positive number.
admin_promo_invalid_format_general: Promo parsing error. Check the format.
admin_promo_created_success: ✅ Promo code {code} created successfully! Bonus: {bonus_days} days Max uses: {max_activations} Valid until: {valid_until_str}.
admin_promo_creation_failed: ❌ Failed to create promo code. Please try again later.
admin_promo_edit_prompt: Send new details for {code} in format: CODE BONUS_DAYS MAX_USES [VALIDITY_DAYS]
admin_ban_user_prompt: Enter user ID or @username to ban:
admin_user_not_found_in_bot_db: User {user_id} not found in bot database.
admin_cannot_ban_self_or_admin: You cannot ban yourself or another admin.
admin_panel_ban_fail_part: , but failed to ban on panel
admin_user_ban_failed_local_db_error: ❌ Failed to ban user in local database.
admin_unban_user_prompt: Enter user ID or @username to unban:
admin_panel_unban_fail_part: , but failed to unban on panel
admin_user_unban_failed_local_db_error: ❌ Failed to unban user in local database.
admin_no_banned_users: There are no banned users at the moment.
admin_confirm_ban_prompt: Are you sure you want to ban {user_display} (ID: {user_id})?
admin_confirm_unban_prompt: Are you sure you want to unban {user_display} (ID: {user_id})?
admin_prompt_for_user_id_or_username_log: Enter user ID or @username to view logs:
admin_log_user_not_found: User "{input}" not found in bot database.
sync_completed: ✅ Sync with panel completed. Status: {status}. Details: {details}
sync_completed_details:
Checked: {total_checked} entries.
Users synced/updated: {users_synced}.
Subscriptions synced/updated: {subs_synced}.
sync_completed_with_errors_details:
Checked: {total_checked} entries.
Users synced/updated: {users_synced}.
Subscriptions synced/updated: {subs_synced}.
Errors: {errors_count}.

First errors:
{error_details_preview}
admin_panel_user_creation_failed: ❌ Failed to create panel user for TG ID {user_id}. Panel unreachable?
error_displaying_logs_too_long: Error: logs too long to display in one message. Try viewing logs for a specific user.
subscription_72h_notification:
👋 Hi, {user_name}!

⏳ Your VPN subscription expires in 3 days — {end_date}.

Please renew it using the button below.
subscription_48h_notification:
👋 Hi, {user_name}!

⏳ Your VPN subscription expires in 2 days — {end_date}.

Please renew it using the button below.
subscription_24h_notification:
👋 Hi, {user_name}!

⏳ Your VPN subscription expires in 1 day — {end_date}.

Please renew it using the button below.
subscription_expired_notification:
👋 Hi, {user_name}!

⛔ Your VPN subscription expired on {end_date}.

Please renew it using the button below.
subscription_expired_yesterday_notificat:
👋 Hi, {user_name}!

⏳ Your VPN subscription expired yesterday ({end_date}).

Please renew it using the button below.
admin_new_trial_notification: 🌡 User {user_id} activated a free trial until {end_date}.
admin_new_payment_notification: 💳 Payment received from user {user_id}: {months} mo. for {amount} {currency}.
admin_user_management_prompt:
👤 User Management

Enter user ID or @username to search:
admin_user_trial_reset_success: ✅ Trial reset! User can activate trial again.
admin_user_add_subscription_prompt:
➕ Adding subscription days for user {user_id}

Enter number of days to add:
admin_user_invalid_days: ❌ Invalid number of days. Enter number from 1 to 3650.
admin_user_send_message_prompt:
✉️ Sending message to user {user_id}

Enter message text:
inline_referral_message:
🚀 Hey! Try this awesome VPN service!

✨ Fast and reliable
🔒 Complete anonymity
🌍 Servers worldwide
💎 Free trial period

Check it out: {referral_link}
inline_referral_description: Share referral link to get bonuses
inline_user_stats_message: 👥 User Statistics 📊 Total: {total} 📈 Active today: {active_today} 💳 With paid subscription: {paid} 🆓 On trial period: {trial} 😴 Inactive: {inactive} 🚫 Banned: {banned} 🎁 Via referral program: {referral}
inline_financial_stats_message: 💰 Financial Statistics 📅 Today: {today:.2f} RUB ({today_count} payments) 📅 Week: {week:.2f} RUB 📅 Month: {month:.2f} RUB 🏆 All time: {all_time:.2f} RUB
inline_system_stats_message: 🖥 System Statistics 🟢 Online: {online} 🔴 Offline: {offline} ⏰ Expired: {expired} 👥 Total users: {total}
inline_admin_help_message: 🤖 Bot Inline Mode 📱 Available commands: 🎁 ref - share referral link 👥 stat - user statistics 💰 financial - financial statistics 🖥 system - system statistics 💡 Just type @{bot_username} and start typing a command in any chat!
inline_admin_help_desc: Available commands: ref, stat, financial, system
inline_user_help_message: 🤖 Bot Inline Mode 📱 Available commands: 🎁 ref - share referral link 💡 Just type @{bot_username} and start typing 'ref' in any chat!
admin_bulk_promo_create_prompt: 📦 Bulk Promo Code Creation Enter data in format: quantity|days|description Example: 10|7|Weekly promo
admin_bulk_promo_step1_quantity: 📦 Bulk Promo Code Creation Step 1 of 4: Quantity Enter the number of promo codes to create (1-1000):
admin_bulk_promo_step2_bonus_days: 📦 Bulk Promo Code Creation Step 2 of 4: Bonus Days Quantity: {quantity} Enter the number of bonus days (1-365):
admin_bulk_promo_step3_max_activations: 📦 Bulk Promo Code Creation Step 3 of 4: Max Activations Quantity: {quantity} Bonus days: {bonus_days} Enter the maximum number of activations for each promo code (1-10000):
admin_bulk_promo_step4_validity: 📦 Bulk Promo Code Creation Step 4 of 4: Validity Period Quantity: {quantity} Bonus days: {bonus_days} Max activations: {max_activations} Choose the validity period for promo codes:
admin_bulk_promo_invalid_bonus_days: ❌ Bonus days must be between 1 and 365
admin_bulk_promo_invalid_max_activations: ❌ Max activations must be between 1 and 10000
admin_bulk_promo_invalid_validity_days: ❌ Validity days must be between 1 and 365
admin_bulk_promo_enter_validity_days: ⏰ Enter the number of validity days for promo codes (1-365):
admin_promo_step1_code: 🎟 Create Promo Code Step 1 of 5: Promo Code Enter promo code (3-30 characters, letters and numbers only):
admin_promo_step2_bonus_days: 🎟 Create Promo Code Step 2 of 5: Bonus Days Code: {code} Enter the number of bonus days (1-365):
admin_promo_step3_max_activations: 🎟 Create Promo Code Step 3 of 5: Max Activations Code: {code} Bonus days: {bonus_days} Enter the maximum number of activations (1-10000):
admin_promo_step4_validity: 🎟 Create Promo Code Step 4 of 5: Validity Period Code: {code} Bonus days: {bonus_days} Max activations: {max_activations} Choose the validity period for the promo code:
admin_promo_step5_description: 🎟 Create Promo Code Step 5 of 5: Description (optional) Code: {code} Bonus days: {bonus_days} Max activations: {max_activations} Valid until: {validity} Enter promo code description or click "Skip":
admin_promo_invalid_code_format: ❌ Promo code must contain 3-30 characters (letters and numbers only)
admin_promo_code_already_exists: ❌ A promo code with this code already exists
admin_promo_enter_validity_days: ⏰ Enter the number of validity days for the promo code (1-365):
admin_promo_created_success: ✅ Promo code created! 🎟 Code: {code} 🎁 Bonus days: {days} 🔢 Max activations: {max_act} ⏰ Valid until: {validity} 📝 Description: {description}
